articles.description: Ben Stokes smashes the record for the highest score by an England batter in a one-day international by hammering a brutal 182 against New Zealand at The Kia Oval.
articles.title: Superb Stokes hits England ODI record 182

articles.description: Great Britain's bid to reach the Davis Cup Finals knockout stage starts with debutant Jack Draper beating Australia's Thanasi Kokkinakis.
articles.title: Debutant Draper gets Britain off to winning start

articles.description: There's a full card of SWPL top-flight action, follow live text updates and watch BBC Alba coverage of Celtic v Hearts.
articles.title: SWPL: All 12 top-flight teams in action & watch Celtic v Hearts

articles.description: Watch the best shots as Ben Stokes hits the highest score by an England batter in a one-day international by hammering 182 against New Zealand at The Kia Oval.
articles.title: Stokes hits England ODI record 182 - best shots

articles.description: Billy Vunipola is back, Wales look to lay down a marker, and Sam Whitelock will equal a record - what to look out for in week two of the Rugby World Cup.
articles.title: What to look out for in week two of Rugby World Cup

articles.description: England's Keira Walsh and Bethany England will miss this month's Women's Nations League matches against Scotland and the Netherlands because of injury.
articles.title: Walsh and England ruled out for England with injury

articles.description: Ultra Trail du Mont Blanc - a 100-mile foot race crossing three countries - is epic. And that's before you even witness it close up.
articles.title: Welcome to the world's biggest, wildest trail race

articles.description: The Women's Super League summer transfer window closes on Thursday, with plenty of potential business still to be conducted. Here are the major moves to keep an eye out for.
articles.title: Which are the deals to watch on WSL deadline day?

articles.description: Hooker Dewi Lake will captain Wales against Portugal in Nice in a side showing 13 changes from the team that defeated Fiji in the World Cup opener.
articles.title: Lake captains much-changed Wales against Portugal

articles.description: Who will replace Aaron Rodgers after his season-ending injury and will the New York Jets still be in play-off contention?
articles.title: What's next for Jets & Rodgers after injury blow?
